insurance_fields.accident_summary: A black sedan, traveling at a high rate of speed, rear-ends a slow-moving vehicle towing red agricultural equipment. The impact causes the sedan to launch into the air, flip, and roll violently multiple times, scattering a large amount of debris across the highway before coming to a rest.
insurance_fields.liability_indicator: The driver of Vehicle A (black sedan) is likely at fault. The collision was a direct rear-end impact with a slow-moving vehicle, indicating the driver of Vehicle A failed to maintain control, was driving too fast for the conditions, or was inattentive to the road ahead.
vehicle_damages: Severe front-end damage to Vehicle A (black sedan)
Rear damage is likely but not clearly visible from the video angle to the slow-moving vehicle
